citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45pm on 02-
DEC-21. The licensee was reached by phone and stated no responsible adult would be available within the 1-hour
allotted waiting time.
Additional Inspectors:
SHANNON SEBERA, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
